bestBHT.bht: The multitude sat about Jesus in a circle, with the disciples forming a sort of inner circle. They attentively listened to Jesus preach, passing the message from one to another in whispers. Jesus' mention of sister, along with mother and brother, suggests the inclusive nature of his teachings, encompassing a wider community. The scene portrays an intimate setting where the listeners eagerly absorbed Jesus' words.

Henry Alford: 32.] And the multitude sat about him is another such.
Archibald T. Robertson: Was sitting about him (εκαθητο περ αυτον). They sat in a circle (κυκλω) around Jesus with the disciples forming a sort of inner circle.
John Gill: In a circle, all around him, to hear him preach.
The message being whispered from one to another.
Christ hereafter makes mention of sister, as well as mother and brother.

bhtAttempts.bht: The verse describes the multitude sitting in a circle around Jesus, eagerly listening to his teachings. The disciples formed an inner circle within this larger group. The scene portrays a close and intimate setting, with the message being passed from person to person in hushed whispers. Jesus' mention of sister in addition to mother and brother hints at the inclusive nature of his teachings.

The multitude sat about Jesus in a circle, attentively listening to his teachings. The disciples formed an inner circle within this larger group, emphasizing the close and intimate setting. Whispers carried the message from one person to another, highlighting the quiet and reverent atmosphere. Jesus' mention of sister, as well as mother and brother, signifies the inclusive nature of his teachings, encompassing a broader sense of family and community.

The multitude gathered around Jesus, sitting in a circle as they hung on to his every word. The disciples formed an inner circle within this larger group, signifying the close and intimate nature of the gathering. The message was whispered from one person to another, creating an atmosphere of quiet anticipation. Jesus' mention of sister, alongside mother and brother, reveals the inclusivity of his teachings, extending beyond immediate family ties.

The multitude sat about Jesus in a circle, with the disciples forming a sort of inner circle. They attentively listened to Jesus preach, passing the message from one to another in whispers. Jesus' mention of sister, along with mother and brother, suggests the inclusive nature of his teachings, encompassing a wider community. The scene portrays an intimate setting where the listeners eagerly absorbed Jesus' words.

The multitude sat about Jesus in a circle, with the disciples forming an inner circle. They sat in this arrangement, eagerly anticipating Jesus' teachings. As the crowd listened intently, whispers carried the message from one person to another. Jesus' mention of sister alongside mother and brother reflects the inclusive nature of his teachings, reaching beyond immediate familial ties. The scene paints a picture of a close and attentive gathering, where the listeners eagerly absorbed the profound wisdom of Jesus.
